name: Rolo's Adventure
description:
Play as Rolo the hedgehog and rush to gather eveything you need before autumn ends Controls
  • Rotate the camera using your mouse, you will move relative to the camera
  • W - Roll forwards
  • S - Roll backwards
  • A - Roll to the left
  • D - Roll to the right
  • R - Reset position (if you get stuck)
  • Hint - Robbie (the little bird sitting on Rolo) will point forwards in the direction you are aiming

Developed as part of the Great Autumn Game Jam

Credits
  • Developed by Balestack
  • Art and models: Balestack, Kenney, Acorn Bringer, Just Create
  • Sound: Mixkit,
  • Font: Amtic SC
